name: Expanding and collapsing the "Filter by Category" section
scenarioId: android/New_version_of_the_wallet_UI_UX_2/Filter_and_Sort_Documents_Redesign_116/filterAndSortDocuments:Expanding and collapsing the "Filter by Category" section
methodName: Expanding and collapsing the "Filter by Category" section

testSteps.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is on the Documents screen
Given the user has opened the filter or sort bottom sheet
When the user taps the Filter by Category section
Then the section should switch between collapsed and expanded views

userStory.storyName: Filtering and sorting documents in the EUDI Wallet
userStory.displayName: Filtering and sorting documents in the EUDI Wallet
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to filter and sort the documents in EUDI Wallet
  So that I can find and view the documents according to my needs

title: Expanding and collapsing the "Filter by Category" section
